The game is fun if you can get past the learning curve. Once you understand everything in the game, it becomes a lot more fun, especially if you have friends that play. My advice, however, is to play BOTH sides equally. There's too much argument going around as to what's fair and balanced and a lot of it comes from people who only play one side. Experience both, see for yourself. But give it time because no matter which side you play, it's going to seem unfair until you fully grasp the game's mechanics.

Steer clear if:

-You expect AAA quality
-Minor game bugs bother you (like dead hard exhausting me while still getting hit)
-You expect matchmaking to always be fair (because it won't). This game's ranking system needs an overhaul.
-You can't stand a toxic AF community (worse than League, Dota, R6 Siege, and CoD).
-You expect reporting players to have any kind of impact. BHVR pretty much has the attitude of, "clips or it didn't happen"
-You don't like long grinds. They've made it easier recently, but you still have to blow blood points (exp) on EACH character if you want their unique perks. 
-You think game balance should be based on the top 1% of the playerbase like streamer Tru3ta1ent says it should. The game is balanced around rank 10 which is right in the middle (ranks start at 20 and go to 1). To his point though, as killer there's a huge difference between facing 4 solo survivors and facing a premade 4 man stack all on discord (nullifying the lack of any sort of in-game chat). There currently isn't a way to tell who is solo and who is in a group, and matchmaking doesn't give you the option to filter such parameters either.

All in all, if you're willing to put in the time, the game is fun, but if any of my aforementioned points are deal breakers for you, well then I don't know what to tell you other than it probably isn't for you. But at least try it out for the duration that steam allows you to refund if you end up not liking it.

This is the only review I have ever made on Steam. The game has changed a lot since it first came out. Now it's all about running in circles, body blocking, tunneling, and camping. There is no more horror aspect. There is no fear factor. Players are forcing the game into a competitive scene. It's extremely grindy for very little reward. The Killer role isn't even the Power role, and is too stressful so it's not even fun. Needed updates take too long to finish, and when they do they come with even more bugs. The developers don't care because they don't have competition to force them to do better.

-Świetny pomysł, gra innowacyjna rozwinęła genre gier niesymetrycznych.
-Niezbalansowana
-Brak trybu Casualowego
-Tryb rankingowy jest zepsuty (pozwala WSZYSTKIM graczom w grze wejść rangę wyżej, co jest sprzeczne z założeniami trybu rankingowego pls fix)
-Gra miło nastraja do grania Civ V
-Jeśli masz przyjaciół to może się będziesz dobrze bawił, jeśli nie to możesz posłuchać seksownych stękań podczas grania killerami, gdy survy będą ci co chwila zrzucać deski na twarz, więc też chyba spoko
-Gra posiada system pay to play (zapłać to będziesz mógł grać wybraną postacią z licencją) oraz pay to win (różowe dodatki za blodpointsy)
-Długi czas oczekiwania na grę powoduje że na reddicie można znaleźć tętniące życiem społeczeństwo
-Niesamowity symulator biegania po lesie/i innych miejscach
-Polecam bo potrzeba nam więcej ludzi żeby nie czekać na mecze tak długo i więcej noobów do zabijania

Would I recommend this game to anyone? Short answer, no.

I like the concept of the game, and occasionally you can get pretty fun matches... However, the community that plays this game can be extremely toxic, and what's worse is that the company who mad this game are encouraging it. The company may not necessarily be directly encouraging it, but the level of balancing and the ridiculous challenges they make in this game lends itself to seeing players having to play in a very toxic manor.

I would highly recommend anyone buying this game to think twice before committing... especially if your not prepared to deal with the occasional toxic community that is present in this game.

Also, at the time of writing this review, queue waiting times for both Survivor's and Killer's are ridicules. Your easily waiting anywhere up to 10 minutes (if not more) for a single match, to which may or not start if the killer or a single survivor drops before the game has had a chance to load the match up.

Классная игра, затягивает очень сильно. Но есть некоторые недочеты.

Un buen juego, a veces hay bugs, a veces las distancias de golpe son un poco raras, pero, nada que sea pecado.

Lo mas difícil de aprender es las cosas micro rpg que tiene, lo que significan algunas cosas y controlar distancias, velocidades... Pero nada que con tiempo de juego no se aprenda...

El sistema de rank es un poco raro, no está mal pero tampoco está bien. Por lo que veo empiezas en rango 20, si mejoras subes y si empeoras bajas. Pero el emparejamiento hace lo que quiere, asi que empiezas jugando con rangos 10 o 5, porque por que no, como killer y surv.

Si me decís que debo expresar lo que me parece este juego de una sola frase diría "Que vicio".

Buenardo de verdad, sinseramente lo unico q me jode de este juego es el tema de los dlc pero por lo demas esta perfecto, eso si desp de haberlo jugado por mucho tiempo ya te rompe las bolas jugar y te cansas.
